adHeader: In Need of a New Haircut???!!!!
adDetails: Edwards salon in Mill Valley is looking for hair models who desire a a tight bob(chin length) all haircuts are performed by apprentices in an advanced training program and supervised by experienced educators! Haircuts are only $10 available times for monday June 16th! -8:30am -11:00am -2:00pm so if your interested in a great deal an a great new haircut, book your appointment soon so we can accommodate you as best we can, classes are held every other monday so ask about future appointments!!!please call Mary V. at show contact info
